summary: The diff shows implementation of 8-character alphanumeric username generation in the frontend (useQueries.ts) with the generateUsername() function using uppercase, lowercase, and numbers. However, the backend username generation logic in backend/main.mo is truncated and cannot be verified. Frontend display components (Header.tsx, MessageBubble.tsx mentioned in frontend-file-summaries.txt) appear to render usernames without transformation, satisfying REQ-2.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the username generation function in backend/main.mo to produce 8-character alphanumeric usernames
missing_requirements.reason: The backend/main.mo file is truncated at the deleteChatroomWithPassword function. The username generation logic that needs to be updated is not visible in the diff, so compliance cannot be verified.
